docs.lead_paragraph: Some students criticized the visit as benefiting the president more than the universities, and suggested that the meeting was little more than a photo op.

headline.print_headline: Handshakes at the White House, Hand-Wringing at Black Colleges

docs.lead_paragraph: Drones fired missiles at suspected al Qaeda targets in two separate attacks in Yemen on Saturday, local sources said, in what appeared to be a third successive day of U.S. strikes against militants in the Arab country.

headline.main: At Least 2 Killed in New Drone Strikes on Al Qaeda in Yemen-Residents
headline.print_headline: At Least 2 Killed in New Drone Strikes on Al Qaeda in Yemen-Residents

docs.lead_paragraph: Faf du Plessis successfully reviewed an lbw decision against him before guiding South Africa to a series-clinching six-wicket victory in the fifth and final one-dayer against New Zealand at Eden Park on Saturday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Philippine defense chief and two other Cabinet members on Saturday toured a U.S. aircraft carrier patrolling the disputed South China Sea on the invitation of the Navy, U.S. Embassy officials said.

headline.main: Top Philippine Officials Fly to US Carrier in Disputed Sea

docs.lead_paragraph: Jordan executed 15 people on Saturday including 10 convicted on terrorism charges ranging from an attack a decade ago on Western tourists to the slaying of a writer, a judicial source and the government spokesman Mohammad al Momani said on Saturday.

headline.main: Jordan Says Executes 15 People, 10 for Terrorism Convictions
headline.print_headline: Jordan Says Executes 15 People, 10 for Terrorism Convictions

docs.lead_paragraph: Jordan on Saturday executed 10 prisoners with ties to Islamic extremism who carried out five shootings and a bombing since 2003, the government spokesman said. It was the largest round of executions in the kingdom in at least a decade.

headline.main: Jordan Hangs 10 for Attacks Linked to Islamic Extremism
headline.print_headline: Jordan Hangs 10 for Attacks Linked to Islamic Extremism

docs.lead_paragraph: Sabrina Ionescu hit two free throws with 6.4 seconds left to give Oregon a 70-69 upset victory over 11th-ranked Washington in a Pac-12 Conference Tournament quarterfinal on Friday night.

docs.lead_paragraph: Loko Kalicha Junno says she trekked for a week to save her 10 cattle from dying of thirst and hunger. But none survived. Now, at one of the last watering holes in this remote village, she fears for herself.

headline.main: Desperate Herders Lose Animals, Hope Amid Drought in Kenya
headline.print_headline: Desperate Herders Lose Animals, Hope Amid Drought in Kenya
